subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sluggish ball movement kept Cleveland’s record at 1-3, but on Twitter, LeBron James told everyone to “relax,” and the team posted 25 assists in winning its next game.
snippet: Sluggish ball movement kept Cleveland’s record at 1-3, but on Twitter, LeBron James told everyone to “relax,” and the team posted 25 assists in winning its next game.
